text: I have tried so many types of litter. One litter even could grow plants if you just threw it outside. That was weird. But I am here for Dr. Elsey's. They run out of stock. A lot. and sometimes I have to compromise on scent. but 40lbs of cat litter for $20? HUGE BAG. (my poor delivery driver) Thats amazing by itsself. Its clumping, works well, and barely tracks. Which is the biggest bonus of them all. That is why I have tried all the litters. Even the super expensive fancy schmancy kinds, dont beat out this one for tracking. My cat, has as bit of lasting brain damage from when I rescued him. He has always made a terrible mess of his litter box area and needs a hooded box, plus a litterbox enclosure with a maze to get out and then a rug on the floor outside of the enclosure. Even that- the mess was insane. And we were going through the litter! This one? Vacuum once or twice a week outside of the enclosure (instead of 2x daily) and my laundry room floors are finally litter free for months now thanks to this fantastic brand. Absorbs well, the unscented truly has no smell but the scented kinds arent overpowering like some brands. Regular clay litter, but somehow formulated for the easiest clean up by far.
